valid: For the period 18:00 (UTC) on Wed 5 Nov 2025 to 18:00 (UTC) on Thu 6 Nov 2025
general_synopsis: Complex low FitzRoy 989 loses it identity and new low expected Bailey 996 by midday Thursday
